mapper.insert: insert into t_fetch_record (t_id, t_warehouseId, t_odd, t_discount, t_other_cost, t_other_costName, t_paid, t_salesman, t_create_date, t_deliverWay, t_remake, t_type, t_customId, t_photo, t_state) values (#{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tWarehouseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tOdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tDiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tOtherCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tOtherCostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tPaid,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tSalesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tDeliverway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRemake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_fetch_record
t_id,
t_warehouseId,
t_odd,
t_discount,
t_other_cost,
t_other_costName,
t_paid,
t_salesman,
t_create_date,
t_deliverWay,
t_remake,
t_type,
t_customId,
t_photo,
t_state,
#{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tWarehouseid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tOdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tDiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
#{tOtherCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{tOtherCostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tPaid,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{tSalesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{tDeliverway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tRemake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tCustomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{tState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT record.t_id AS id, record.t_odd AS odd, record.t_salesman AS salesman, record.t_state AS state, record.t_paid AS paid, record.t_create_date AS createTime, w.t_name AS warehouse, c.t_name AS custom FROM t_fetch_record record LEFT JOIN t_warehouse w ON record.t_warehouseId = w.t_id LEFT JOIN t_custom c ON record.t_customId = c.t_id WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY record.t_create_date DESC

SELECT t_id, t_warehouseId, t_odd, t_discount, t_other_cost, t_other_costName, t_paid, t_salesman, t_create_date, t_deliverWay, t_remake, t_photo, t_type, t_customId, t_state FROM t_fetch_record WHERE t_id = #{id}
